title: 1 Bedroom in Evanston - W/D In Unit, Dishwasher, Heat Included!
posting_body: Email, text or call Danielle at (312) 339-6241
Beautiful, sunny, spacious, recently remodeled apartments at 817 Seward St. in Evanston
-Utility package of $113 monthly covers heat, garbage, sewer and water
-Built in Air Conditioning in living room; tenants can put window units in bedrooms
-Radiator Heat
-Washer/Dryer in unit
-Dishwasher
-Separate dining area
-Remodeled Ceramic tiled Bathrooms
-Remodeled Kitchen
-Hardwood Floors Throughout
-Microwave included
-On-site Management and Maintenance
-Off-street parking available for $60/monthly
-Ample street parking available with $85 annual Wheel Tax paid to The City of Evanston
Five minute walk to South Boulevard Purple Line.
Close to Ridgeville Park, Reba Park, and Eiden Park.
Near downtown Evanston, great shopping and dinning.
Neighboring Wilmette, Rogers Park, Skokie, West Rogers Park, Lincolnwood, Northwestern University and Saint Francis Hospital.
Tenant pays vendor directly for  for electric, cooking gas and WiFi
Visit our website at <URL> for more information and similar apartments.
